Title: Hanaukyou Maid-tai OVA
Description:
['In this three-episode OVA, Taro learns more about Cynthia`s life as herself and her alter-ego Grace. He also undergoes training with his bodyguard Konoe. And finally, Ikuyo dupes Taro in spending a whole day disguised as a maid.  ', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
Characters: ['Mariel', 'Hanaukyou, Tarou', 'Ichigo, Sango and Ringo', 'Tsurugi, Konoe', 'Yashima, Sanae', 'Landlavizar, Cynthia', 'Suzuki, Ikuyo', 'Jihiyou, Ryuuka', 'Grace']
Voices: ['Tanaka, Rie', 'Kaida, Yuki', 'Hiramatsu, Akiko', 'Kaneda, Tomoko', 'Arishima, Moyu', 'Takahashi, Rieko', 'Kaneda, Tomoko']
Staff: [['Ide, Yasunori', 'Director, Series Composition'], ['Matsuoka, Hiroki', 'Sound Director'], ['Tanaka, Rie', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Hiramatsu, Akiko', 'Theme Song Performance']]
